text: Ra uhi ta ho jasale akasaharu ra prthvila'i satyaka satha bana'eko cha, ra juna dina usale yatimatra bhanne cha ki bha'ihala ta tyo bha'ihalcha. Usako kura samco ra prabhavakari cha ra juna dina sura (singa) phukincha tyasa dina usaiko rajya hunecha. Drsya ra adrsya kurako u jnata ho ra uhi nai bud'dhi sampanna ra sarvajna cha
